item.description:
Ladies and Gents,

The Pavilion is located in Old Lyme. It's basically a beach with a bar right on the spot. Sunday this is the spot to be. If you end up having an appetite, the bar has a short menu. There are bands that play and sometimes a DJ that follows during the afternoon into the night. So we can all dance as well.

So come and get your drink n tan on... I'll bring a volleyball so we can play a few games. We will meet up at the Pavillion at 1p.m. I'll be there for a half hour to 45 minutes to wait for everyone then we'll be on the beach right in front of the place. I will leave my phone on me so call me and I'll lead you into the group should you show up later on. Feel free to post any info or thoughts about this venue. This will be a fun event!

 Sunday June 17th 1p.m.--->The Pavilion in Old Lyme: http://www.pavilionbeachbar.com

 

See You There!

John

(860) 919-9782
